name: Jump the really really badly named game
name_original: Jump the really really badly named game
description:
Jump on the grey tiles, make them explode clear all the grey tiles to complete the level.  This is a prototype.  I'm looking for feedback on changes that should be made and if i should move forward with the game.

Try changing the FOV in the pause menu to see how it changes the gameplay.  what FOV do you think the game should be in?

Thanks for giving it a look!
